title: Drawing, "Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Game Room and Bar", 1935
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Lower left corner: Game Room and Bar/for/Mr. Jascha Heifetz; measurements and descriptions throughout; On verso in graphite: Heifetz Bar [underlined].
description: Floor plan for game room and bar, Jascha Heifetz apartment, New York City. Descending staircase at upper left corner. Bridge table and four chairs near upper left, in front of stair rail. Window on upper wall to left. Wraparound five-piece sofa in upper right corner. Fireplace on upper right wall, fronted by rectangular table. Large chair to right of fireplace. Curved bar in lower right corner. Five round barstools surround bar, shelves behind bar. Radiator and window on lower left wall. Double-door to the right of window and radiator. Doorway on lower wall to left. Indication of room partition between bar and gameroom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Game Room and Bar", 1935.
1935. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-238.
